conversion_verification.notes: Second image is a true cutaway/isometric 3D model with extruded walls (height + thickness), visible room volumes, and an elevated angled viewpoint exposing interiors.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Clear wall height/thickness, readable floor-vs-wall separation, and clean cutaway. Perspective is stable with minimal distortion; some edges/openings are simplified.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Overall layout matches: large living zone with adjacent dining, kitchen/utility at lower-left, bedroom cluster to right, master suite with dress/toilets at top, and balconies in corresponding locations. Minor proportional/partition simplifications and not all openings are verifiable.

interior_elements.notes: Major furniture present in living/dining and bedrooms; kitchen counters present; bathrooms include basic fixtures. Some rooms/fixtures appear simplified compared to the detailed 2D plan.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean presentation with good separation of walls/floors and adequate lighting; interiors are readable. Minor ambiguity in doors/windows and some small partition edges.

detected_errors.description: Doors/windows are not all clearly represented or verifiable on the exact walls compared to the 2D plan (some openings appear simplified/omitted).
Furniture and bathroom/kitchen elements are simplified; some fine-grain room identity cues from the 2D plan are reduced.

summary: A true 3D cutaway conversion with strong overall layout fidelity, with minor simplifications in openings and interior detailing.
